Title: Lost in translation: Deciphering the mechanism of action of anti-human CTLA-4
Abstract: © 2018 American Association for Cancer Research.Despite a number of preclinical studies demonstrating that the activity of anti-CTLA-4 antibodies in murine models of cancer relies on effector T-cell activation and regulatory T cell depletion, the activity of the clinical antibodies remains controversial. To decipher such mechanisms is critical to the development of novel and more potent immunotherapies.
